mapper.select: select plan_id, member_id, title, start_date, end_date, contents from plan where member_id = #{id} and status = 'Y'

select p.plan_id, p.member_id, p.title, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.contents, a.content_id, plan_date, i.title as attraction_title, i.content_type_id from plan p join plan_attraction a on p.plan_id = a.plan_id join attraction_info i on a.content_id = i.content_id where p.plan_id = #{pid} order by plan_attraction_id ASC, plan_date ASC;
